content: 28 32 stitches on needle 2 the leg resume working in the round resume working the pattern as before work the leg until it is 1 5 inched shy of the desired length cuff round 1 k2 sm work in charted/written cable pattern over 10 stitches sm *k2 p2 repeat from the * to the end of needle 2 repeat cuff pattern working the correct number row of the cable pattern for 1 5 inches ending with round 4 of the cable pattern bind off all stitches in pattern using a stretchy bind-off copyright laura linneman llinnema@gmail com www theknitgirllls com page 4/6 right sock complete toe in same manner as left foot foot note the bottom/sole of the foot will be worked on needle 2 and is stockinette knit every round until the heel increases round 1 on needle 1 knit 16 20 stitches place the first marker work the 10 stitches of row 1 of the cable pattern chart/written directions on page 2 place second marker knit the remaining 2 stitches of the row on needle 2 knit all stitches rounds 2-6 on needle 1 you will knit 16 20 stitches sm work the corresponding cable pattern chart/written direction row sm knit to the end of the needle on needle 2 you will knit all stitches the rest of the left sock will be worked the same as the right with the cable panel being placed as a mirror image until you reach the cuff cuff needle one *p2 k2 repeat from the * until the first marker sm work in charted/written cable pattern over 10 stitches sm k2 needle two *p2 k2 repeat from the *across the entire row copyright laura linneman llinnema@gmail com www theknitgirllls com page 5/6 repeat cuff pattern working the correct number row of the cable pattern for 1 5 inches ending with round 4 of the cable pattern bind off all stitches in pattern using a stretchy bind-off abbreviations cn cable needle k knit p purl p2tog purl 2 stitches together sl slip sm slip marker ssk slip slip knit 2 slipped stitches together copyright laura linneman llinnema@gmail com www theknitgirllls com page 6/6
